aboutPage.title: About Trading Bot
aboutPage.introduction: Our team provides daily, weekly, and monthly performance reports to keep you informed about the bot's performance. If you plan to invest in this field, you can make better decisions. The trading bot typically trades on currency pairs and has an excellent track record in account management and does not use Martingale.
aboutPage.whoWeAreText1: First of all, I would like to inform you that we will send you a comprehensive video tutorial on how to connect your account to copy trading.
aboutPage.whoWeAreText2: The bot provides the best entry and exit points for trading using advanced mathematical and fundamental analysis techniques. Our team consists of specialists in various areas of financial markets who monitor markets around the clock. We also try to familiarize you more with the concept of copy trading through educational content we provide in this channel.
